pdf.compress.faq.q1: How much can I compress my PDF?
pdf.compress.faq.a1: The compression depends on the content. PDFs with many images can be reduced significantly (up to 90%), while text-heavy PDFs show smaller reductions.
pdf.compress.faq.a2: Our tool uses smart compression to maintain the best possible quality. You can choose the 'Low' compression level for maximum quality.
pdf.compress.faq.q3: Is there a file size limit?
pdf.compress.faq.a3: Yes, you can compress PDFs up to 50MB for free without any registration.
pdf.compress.faq.a4: Compression is usually very fast and takes only a few seconds, depending on the file size and number of pages.
pdf.compress.faq.a5: Yes. Compression happens entirely in your browser. Your files are never uploaded to any server.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
api.faq.q1: What types of APIs can I test?
api.faq.a1: You can test REST, GraphQL, SOAP, and WebSocket APIs. We support all standard HTTP methods.
api.faq.q2: How do I authenticate API requests?
api.faq.a2: Add your authentication headers, API keys, or OAuth tokens in the request configuration panel.
api.faq.q3: Can I save and share API requests?
api.faq.a3: Yes! Save your requests locally and export/import them to share with your team.
api.faq.a4: Credentials are stored only in your browser's local storage and never transmitted to our servers.
api.faq.a5: Yes. Define environment variables to switch between development, staging, and production APIs easily.
formatter.faq.a1: We support JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, JSON, XML, Python, Java, C#, PHP, SQL, Ruby, Go, C++, and Swift.
formatter.faq.q2: Does formatting change my code logic?
formatter.faq.a2: No. The formatter only adjusts whitespace, indentation, and line breaks. Your code logic remains unchanged.
formatter.faq.a3: Yes! You can choose between tabs and spaces, and select your preferred indentation size (2 or 4 spaces).
formatter.faq.q4: Is there a code length limit?
formatter.faq.a4: You can format files up to 500KB. For larger files, consider splitting them into smaller modules.
formatter.faq.a5: Yes. All formatting happens in your browser. Your code is never sent to any server.
json.faq.a1: You can validate, format, minify, compare, and convert JSON to other formats like CSV or YAML.
json.faq.q2: Can I validate JSON against a schema?
json.faq.a2: Yes! Upload or paste your JSON Schema and validate your data against it.
json.faq.q3: How do I fix invalid JSON?
json.faq.a3: Our validator highlights the exact line and character where the error occurs, making it easy to fix.
json.faq.q4: Is there a size limit for JSON files?
json.faq.a4: You can process JSON files up to 10MB in size.
json.faq.q5: Can I convert JSON to other formats?
json.faq.a5: Yes! Convert JSON to CSV, YAML, XML, or formatted tables.
seo.faq.q1: What SEO metrics can I analyze?
seo.faq.a1: Analyze meta tags, headings, images, links, page speed, mobile-friendliness, and more.
seo.faq.q2: How do I check my meta tags?
seo.faq.a2: Enter your URL and our tool will extract and analyze all meta tags including Open Graph and Twitter Cards.
seo.faq.a3: Yes! Our sitemap generator crawls your site and creates an XML sitemap ready for search engines.
seo.faq.a4: Yes. Validate your robots.txt file and check which pages are blocked from crawling.
seo.faq.q5: Can I check for broken links?
seo.faq.a5: Yes! Our link checker scans your pages and reports any broken or redirected links.
pdf.merge.faq.q1: How many PDFs can I merge at once?
pdf.merge.faq.a1: You can merge unlimited PDF files at once. Our tool handles large batches efficiently.
pdf.merge.faq.q2: Is there a file size limit?
pdf.merge.faq.a2: Each PDF file can be up to 100MB. For larger files, consider compressing them first.
pdf.merge.faq.a3: Yes! All files are processed securely and automatically deleted after merging. We never store or access your content.
pdf.merge.faq.q4: Can I change the order of pages?
pdf.merge.faq.a4: You can reorder the PDFs before merging. For page-level reordering, use our Split PDF tool first.
pdf.merge.faq.a5: No. Our tool preserves the original quality, formatting, fonts, and images of your PDFs.
pdf.split.faq.q1: How do I extract specific pages?
pdf.split.faq.a1: Enter page numbers or ranges (e.g., 1-3, 5, 7-10) to extract exactly the pages you need.
pdf.split.faq.q2: Can I split into individual pages?
pdf.split.faq.a2: Yes! Choose 'Split all pages' to create separate PDF files for each page.
pdf.split.faq.a3: No limit! You can split PDFs with hundreds of pages.
pdf.split.faq.a4: Yes. All processing happens on our secure servers and files are deleted immediately after processing.
pdf.split.faq.q5: Can I preview pages before splitting?
pdf.split.faq.a5: Yes! Our tool shows thumbnails of all pages so you can select exactly which ones to extract.
pdf.word.faq.a1: We support .doc and .docx files from Microsoft Word 97 and later versions.
pdf.word.faq.a2: Yes! Tables, images, fonts, and layouts are preserved in the converted PDF.
pdf.word.faq.q3: Can I convert multiple files at once?
pdf.word.faq.a3: Yes! Upload multiple Word documents and convert them all in one batch.
pdf.word.faq.q4: Is there a file size limit?
pdf.word.faq.a4: Each file can be up to 50MB. For larger documents, consider splitting them first.
pdf.word.faq.a5: No! Our tool works entirely online. No software installation required.
pdf.text.faq.q1: Can I extract text from scanned PDFs?
pdf.text.faq.a1: Yes! Our OCR technology can extract text from scanned documents and images within PDFs.
pdf.text.faq.a2: We extract plain text. For formatted output, use our PDF to Word converter.
pdf.text.faq.q3: Can I extract text from specific pages?
pdf.text.faq.a3: Yes! Select which pages you want to extract text from.
pdf.text.faq.a4: We support text extraction in over 100 languages including Arabic, Chinese, and Hebrew.
pdf.text.faq.a5: Yes. Files are processed securely and deleted immediately after extraction.
pdf.images.faq.q1: What image formats can I export to?
pdf.images.faq.a1: Export to JPG, PNG, or WEBP format with customizable quality settings.
pdf.images.faq.a2: Yes! Select from 72 to 300 DPI for web or print quality images.
pdf.images.faq.q3: Can I convert specific pages only?
pdf.images.faq.a3: Yes! Select individual pages or page ranges to convert.
pdf.images.faq.a4: No limit! Convert PDFs with any number of pages.
pdf.images.faq.a5: Multiple images are downloaded as a ZIP file for convenience.
docx.faq.a1: Create, edit, convert, and merge DOCX files. Convert to PDF, HTML, or plain text.
docx.faq.q2: Can I edit DOCX files online?
docx.faq.a2: Yes! Our editor supports text formatting, tables, images, and more.
docx.faq.a3: Yes! We preserve fonts, styles, tables, and images during conversion.
docx.faq.q4: Can I merge multiple DOCX files?
docx.faq.a4: Yes! Combine multiple Word documents into a single file.
docx.faq.a5: No! All tools work directly in your browser without any software.
latex.faq.a1: We support standard LaTeX including math formulas, tables, figures, and bibliographies.
latex.faq.a2: Yes! Live preview shows your rendered document as you type.
latex.faq.a3: Yes! Compile your LaTeX document directly to high-quality PDF.
latex.faq.a4: We support most common packages. Check our documentation for the full list.
latex.faq.a5: Export your project as a .tex file to share with collaborators.
text.faq.a1: Case conversion, find/replace, word count, line sorting, duplicate removal, and more.
text.faq.a2: Yes! Convert to uppercase, lowercase, title case, or sentence case.
text.faq.q3: How do I remove duplicate lines?
text.faq.a3: Paste your text and click 'Remove Duplicates' to get unique lines only.
text.faq.a4: Yes! Sort lines A-Z, Z-A, or by line length.
text.faq.a5: You can process text up to 1MB in size.
spreadsheet.faq.a1: We support Excel (.xlsx, .xls), CSV, TSV, and ODS files.
spreadsheet.faq.a2: Yes! Convert Excel to CSV, CSV to Excel, and other format combinations.
spreadsheet.faq.a3: Yes! All processing happens securely and files are deleted after conversion.
spreadsheet.faq.a4: Yes! See a preview of your spreadsheet before converting.
spreadsheet.faq.a5: Formulas are preserved when converting between Excel formats. CSV exports values only.
subtitle.faq.a1: We support SRT (SubRip), VTT (WebVTT), and ASS (Advanced SubStation Alpha) formats.
subtitle.faq.a2: Yes! Our editor allows you to adjust start/end times for each subtitle entry with millisecond precision.
subtitle.faq.q3: How do I merge two subtitle files?
subtitle.faq.a3: Upload both files in the merger tool. You can apply time offsets to align them before combining.
subtitle.faq.a4: Yes. When working with ASS files, all styling information including fonts, colors, and positioning is preserved.
subtitle.faq.a5: No. All processing happens in your browser. Your subtitle files never leave your device.
images-to-pdf.faq.q1: What image formats can I use?
images-to-pdf.faq.a1: JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, BMP, and TIFF images are all supported.
images-to-pdf.faq.q2: Can I arrange the page order?
images-to-pdf.faq.a2: Yes! Drag and drop images to arrange them in your desired order.
images-to-pdf.faq.a3: Choose from A4, Letter, Legal, or fit to image size.
images-to-pdf.faq.a4: No limit! Add as many images as you need.
images-to-pdf.faq.a5: Yes! Images are embedded at their original quality.
favicon.faq.a1: We generate all standard favicon sizes: 16x16, 32x32, 48x48, 64x64, 128x128, and 256x256.
favicon.faq.a2: Upload PNG, JPG, SVG, or any common image format.
favicon.faq.q3: Do you generate Apple Touch icons?
favicon.faq.a3: Yes! We include apple-touch-icon and other platform-specific icons.
favicon.faq.a4: Yes! We generate both .ico and .png formats for maximum compatibility.
favicon.faq.q5: How do I add the favicon to my site?
favicon.faq.a5: Download the package and follow the included HTML snippets to add to your site.
icon.faq.a1: Generate icons for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, and web applications.
icon.faq.a2: All standard sizes for each platform including @1x, @2x, and @3x for retina displays.
icon.faq.a3: Yes! Choose which platforms and sizes you need.
icon.faq.a4: Use a square PNG or SVG at least 1024x1024 pixels for best results.
icon.faq.a5: Download a ZIP file containing all icons organized by platform.
image-converter.faq.q1: What formats can I convert between?
image-converter.faq.a1: Convert between JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, BMP, TIFF, and SVG formats.
image-converter.faq.q2: Can I convert multiple images at once?
image-converter.faq.a2: Yes! Batch convert multiple images in one operation.
image-converter.faq.a3: Yes! Choose quality settings to balance file size and image quality.
image-converter.faq.a4: Yes! Optionally resize images during conversion.
image-converter.faq.a5: Yes! All conversion happens in your browser. Images never leave your device.
video-compressor.faq.a1: MP4, WebM, MOV, AVI, and MKV formats are supported.
video-compressor.faq.q2: How much can videos be compressed?
video-compressor.faq.a2: Typically 50-80% size reduction while maintaining good quality.
video-compressor.faq.a3: Our smart compression minimizes quality loss. You can also adjust quality settings.
video-compressor.faq.q4: Is there a file size limit?
video-compressor.faq.a4: You can compress videos up to 500MB in size.
video-compressor.faq.a5: Yes! Processing happens locally in your browser. Videos are never uploaded.

gemini.editor.paste_placeholder: Paste your Gemini messages here (Markdown supported)...
gemini.faq.q1: How do I save Gemini messages as PDF?
gemini.faq.a1: Simply copy your Gemini messages, paste them into our editor, and click the 'Export PDF' button.
gemini.faq.a2: Yes! We support full Markdown syntax used by Gemini, including headers, lists, and code blocks.
gemini.faq.q3: Can I edit the Gemini output before downloading?
gemini.faq.a3: Absolutely. You can edit the text directly in the editor and see real-time updates.
gemini.faq.a4: Yes. All processing happens in your browser. Your Gemini conversations are never sent to our servers.
gemini.faq.q5: Can I convert Gemini text to Word?
gemini.faq.a5: Yes! You can download your edited Gemini responses as a perfectly formatted Word document.
editor.title: Professional Online Text Editor
editor.description: A powerful, clean, and professional online text editor with Markdown support, PDF export, and advanced formatting tools.
editor.placeholder: Start typing or paste your content here...
editor.meta.title: Online Text Editor - Professional Write & Export to PDF/Word
editor.meta.description: Free professional online text editor. Write, format, and export your documents to PDF or Word instantly. Features real-time word count and markdown support.
editor.meta.name: Kleinbyte Online Editor
editor.meta.app_desc: Write and format professional documents online with instant PDF/Word export.
editor.meta.keywords: online text editor, writing tool, docx to pdf, markdown editor, professional writing app, text formatter
editor.faq.q1: Is this text editor free to use?
editor.faq.a1: Yes! Our online text editor is completely free to use with no hidden costs or registration required.
editor.faq.q2: Can I save my work as PDF?
editor.faq.a2: Absolutely. You can export your formatted text directly to a professional PDF or Word document.
editor.faq.a3: Yes, it supports common markdown shortcuts for headers, bold, italic, and more.
editor.faq.a4: Yes. All editing happens in your browser. We never store or see your private documents.
editor.faq.a5: While you need a connection to load the site, the editor logic runs locally in your browser for maximum speed and privacy.
